Uses of Package
org.apache.flex.swf.types

  • Packages that use org.apache.flex.swf.types 
    Package Description
    org.apache.flex.compiler.fxg.swf  
    org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom  
    org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf  
    org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.types  
    org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets
    This package is the internal counterpart of the external org.apache.flex.compiler.targets package.
    org.apache.flex.compiler.targets
    This package contains interfaces related to targets.
    org.apache.flex.swf
    This package and its subpackages contain a support library for reading, writing, and representing SWF files.
    org.apache.flex.swf.builders
    This package contains classes and interfaces that help with building SWF tags.
    org.apache.flex.swf.io
    This package contains classes and interfaces for reading and writing SWF files.
    org.apache.flex.swf.tags
    This package contains classes and interfaces representing tags in a SWF file.
    org.apache.flex.swf.types
    This package contains classes and interfaces that represent data types that appear in SWF tags or in the SWF header.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.swf.types used by org.apache.flex.compiler.fxg.swf 
    Class and Description
    BevelFilter
    The Bevel filter creates a smooth bevel on display list objects.
    BlurFilter
    The blur filter is based on a sub-pixel precise median filter (also known as a box filter).
    DropShadowFilter
    The Drop Shadow filter is based on the same median filter as the blur filter, but the filter is applied only on the alpha color channel to obtain a shadow pixel plane.
    FillStyle
    The SWF file format supports three basic types of fills for a shape.
    Filter
    IFilter record.
    GlowFilter
    The Glow filter works in the same way as the Drop Shadow filter, except that it does not have a distance and angle parameter.
    Gradient
    The gradient structures are part of the FILLSTYLE structure.
    GradientBevelFilter
    The Gradient Bevel filter is extension of the normal Bevel IFilter and allow a gradient to be specified instead of a single color.
    GradientGlowFilter
    The Gradient Glow filter is extension of the normal Glow IFilter and allow a gradient to be specified instead of a single color.
    GradRecord
    The GradRecord defines a gradient control point.
    LineStyle
    A line style represents a width and color of a line.
    LineStyle2
    LineStyle2 builds upon the capabilities of the LineStyle record by allowing the use of new types of joins and caps as well as scaling options and the ability to fill a stroke.
    Rect
    A rectangle value represents a rectangular region defined by a minimum x- and y-coordinate position and a maximum x- and y-coordinate position.
    ShapeRecord
    There are four types of shape records: End shape record Style change record Straight edge record Curved edge record Each individual shape record is byte-aligned within an array of shape records.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.swf.types used by org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom 
    Class and Description
    LineStyle
    A line style represents a width and color of a line.
    Rect
    A rectangle value represents a rectangular region defined by a minimum x- and y-coordinate position and a maximum x- and y-coordinate position.
    ShapeRecord
    There are four types of shape records: End shape record Style change record Straight edge record Curved edge record Each individual shape record is byte-aligned within an array of shape records.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.swf.types used by org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf 
    Class and Description
    CurvedEdgeRecord
    The curved-edge record stores the edge as two X-Y deltas.
    CXFormWithAlpha
    The CXFORMWITHALPHA record extends the functionality of CXFORM by allowing color transforms to be applied to the alpha channel, as well as the red, green, and blue channels.
    LineStyle
    A line style represents a width and color of a line.
    Matrix
    The MATRIX record represents a standard 2x3 transformation matrix of the sort commonly used in 2D graphics.
    Rect
    A rectangle value represents a rectangular region defined by a minimum x- and y-coordinate position and a maximum x- and y-coordinate position.
    RGBA
    The RGBA record represents a color as 32-bit red, green, blue and alpha value.
    ShapeRecord
    There are four types of shape records: End shape record Style change record Straight edge record Curved edge record Each individual shape record is byte-aligned within an array of shape records.
    StyleChangeRecord
    The style change record is also a non-edge record.
    Styles
    Styles is a composition of LineStyleArray and FillStyleArray.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.swf.types used by org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.types 
    Class and Description
    Matrix
    The MATRIX record represents a standard 2x3 transformation matrix of the sort commonly used in 2D graphics.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.swf.types used by org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets 
    Class and Description
    RGB
    The RGB record represents a color as a 24-bit red, green, and blue value.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.swf.types used by org.apache.flex.compiler.targets

    RGB
    The RGB record represents a color as a 24-bit red, green, and blue value.

    Class and Description

    RGB
    The RGB record represents a color as a 24-bit red, green, and blue value.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.swf.types used by org.apache.flex.swf.builders 
    Class and Description
    Shape
    Shape is used by the DefineFont tag, to define character glyphs.
    Styles
    Styles is a composition of LineStyleArray and FillStyleArray.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.swf.types used by org.apache.flex.swf.io 
    Class and Description
    ARGB
    The ARGB record behaves exactly like the RGBA record, but the alpha value for the ARGB record is in the first byte.
    Matrix
    The MATRIX record represents a standard 2x3 transformation matrix of the sort commonly used in 2D graphics.
    Rect
    A rectangle value represents a rectangular region defined by a minimum x- and y-coordinate position and a maximum x- and y-coordinate position.
    RGB
    The RGB record represents a color as a 24-bit red, green, and blue value.
    RGBA
    The RGBA record represents a color as 32-bit red, green, blue and alpha value.
    TextRecord
    A TEXTRECORD sets text styles for subsequent characters.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.swf.types used by org.apache.flex.swf.tags 
    Class and Description
    ButtonRecord
    A button record defines a character to be displayed in one or more button states.
    ClipActions
    Clip actions are valid for placing sprite characters only.
    CXForm
    The CXFORM record defines a simple transform that can be applied to the color space of a graphic object.
    CXFormWithAlpha
    The CXFORMWITHALPHA record extends the functionality of CXFORM by allowing color transforms to be applied to the alpha channel, as well as the red, green, and blue channels.
    Filter
    IFilter record.
    KerningRecord
    A Kerning Record defines the distance between two glyphs in EM square coordinates.
    Matrix
    The MATRIX record represents a standard 2x3 transformation matrix of the sort commonly used in 2D graphics.
    Rect
    A rectangle value represents a rectangular region defined by a minimum x- and y-coordinate position and a maximum x- and y-coordinate position.
    RGB
    The RGB record represents a color as a 24-bit red, green, and blue value.
    RGBA
    The RGBA record represents a color as 32-bit red, green, blue and alpha value.
    Shape
    Shape is used by the DefineFont tag, to define character glyphs.
    ShapeWithStyle
    The ShapeWithStyle structure extends the Shape structure by including fill style and line style information.
    SoundInfo
    The SOUNDINFO record modifies how an event sound is played.
    TextRecord
    A TEXTRECORD sets text styles for subsequent characters.
    ZoneRecord
    ZoneRecord used in DefineFontAlignZonesTag.
  • Classes in org.apache.flex.swf.types used by org.apache.flex.swf.types 
    Class and Description
    BevelFilter
    The Bevel filter creates a smooth bevel on display list objects.
    BlurFilter
    The blur filter is based on a sub-pixel precise median filter (also known as a box filter).
    ConvolutionFilter
    The Convolution filter is a two-dimensional discrete convolution.
    CXForm
    The CXFORM record defines a simple transform that can be applied to the color space of a graphic object.
    CXFormWithAlpha
    The CXFORMWITHALPHA record extends the functionality of CXFORM by allowing color transforms to be applied to the alpha channel, as well as the red, green, and blue channels.
    DropShadowFilter
    The Drop Shadow filter is based on the same median filter as the blur filter, but the filter is applied only on the alpha color channel to obtain a shadow pixel plane.
    EdgeRecord
    Edge records have a TypeFlag of 1.
    FillStyle
    The SWF file format supports three basic types of fills for a shape.
    FillStyleArray
    A fill style array enumerates a number of fill styles.
    Filter
    IFilter record.
    GlowFilter
    The Glow filter works in the same way as the Drop Shadow filter, except that it does not have a distance and angle parameter.
    GlyphEntry
    The GLYPHENTRY structure describes a single character in a line of text.
    Gradient
    The gradient structures are part of the FILLSTYLE structure.
    GradientBevelFilter
    The Gradient Bevel filter is extension of the normal Bevel IFilter and allow a gradient to be specified instead of a single color.
    GradientGlowFilter
    The Gradient Glow filter is extension of the normal Glow IFilter and allow a gradient to be specified instead of a single color.
    GradRecord
    The GradRecord defines a gradient control point.
    IDataType
    The interface for all SWF data types.
    IFillStyle
    Root interface for all the the different FillStyle classes for SWF tags
    ILineStyle
    Root interface for all the the different LineStyle classes for SWF tags
    LineStyle
    A line style represents a width and color of a line.
    LineStyleArray
    Not that this array holds ILineStyle, to the elements can be different
    Matrix
    The MATRIX record represents a standard 2x3 transformation matrix of the sort commonly used in 2D graphics.
    MorphFillStyle
    A fill style represents how a closed shape is filled in.
    MorphGradient
    Morph gradient data type.
    MorphLineStyle
    Morph line style data type.
    Rect
    A rectangle value represents a rectangular region defined by a minimum x- and y-coordinate position and a maximum x- and y-coordinate position.
    RGB
    The RGB record represents a color as a 24-bit red, green, and blue value.
    RGBA
    The RGBA record represents a color as 32-bit red, green, blue and alpha value.
    Shape
    Shape is used by the DefineFont tag, to define character glyphs.
    ShapeRecord
    There are four types of shape records: End shape record Style change record Straight edge record Curved edge record Each individual shape record is byte-aligned within an array of shape records.
    ShapeRecord.ShapeRecordType
    This is a type marker for subclasses of ShapeRecord.
    SoundEnvelope
    Sound Envelope record.
    StraightEdgeRecord.LineType
    Type of line.
    Styles
    Styles is a composition of LineStyleArray and FillStyleArray.
    ZoneData
    ZoneData used in ZoneRecord.
    ZoneRecord
    ZoneRecord used in DefineFontAlignZonesTag.
